question: A square loop of side 2m lies in the Y-Z plane in a region having a magnetic field <katex>$\vec{B}=(5\hat{i}+3\hat{j}-4\hat{k})T$</katex>. The magnitude of magnetic flux through the square loop is
explanation: Area vector <katex>$\vec{A}$</katex> is perpendicular to Y-Z plane, so it is in X-direction.
